caption.p: Geographical biases of temperature and precipitation in CMIP5 models. a Multi-model mean of temperature biases and b precipitation biases in summer during 1979–2005 from 19 CMIP5 historical simulations. Regions where at least two thirds of the models (i.e., 13 out of 19 CMIP5 models) agree on the sign of the difference are marked with black circles. The blue rectangle (31–52° N, 262–271° E) indicates the central U.S.
